Posts.Content: Hi Margaret, My oncologist told me it doesn't really matter when you take it, so long as you do so at the same time every day. I've opted to take it in the morning just so I don't forget! So far so good. http://pinkandapple.wordpress.com/
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen

Posts.Content: Hi There, I've found tamoxifen to have very minor side effects. I've been on it for 7 weeks and initially had a lot of hot flushes which eased gradually (and significantly after I changed brands). I'm documenting my experience here: http://pinkandapple.wordpress.com/ I wish you all the best with your journey, and hope your body deals with tamoxifen easily. It didn't take me long to get used to it. PA
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen - what are your experiences?
